verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
If you would really praise Me,
It's more than just a song,
More than words and melodies and pretty sounds;
So if you want to praise Me,
The way I should be praised,
Like a mighty stream let righteousness run down.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Let righteousness run down,
Run down as a mighty stream;
Let your life be light and walk upright,
Let your heart and hands be clean.
Godly lives are sacred music,
The pure in heart can make Me sing;
So let righteousness run down,
Let righteousness run down,
Let righteousness run down as a mighty stream!
